description: I think I just only like it

As a terminal emulator, its functional.
But compared to the Fedora 30 version of the GNOME Terminal, its missing at least 2 key features for me:
1. An always visible New Tab button. The button becomes visible when you open a second tab, but on Fedora 30, its always visible by default.
2. Set Title. I run multiple tabs and organize them by function, so I like setting custom titles for my tabs based on how I intend to use them. This version does not allow that.
summary: OK Terminal Emulator, but there are better customizations

在设置->键盘->快捷键->自定义快捷键->添加 名称：Terminal 命令：gnome-terminal  再右上边点击后 按Ctrl +Alt +T

description: nicefasafsadfdasdf

1.左上角进入活动程序界面
2.键盘输入keyboard
3.将键盘快捷键拉至最下方并点击+号
4.随便起个名称，在命令中输入/usr/bin/gnome-terminal，最后自己设置个快捷键（我用的常用款ctl+alt+t）
summary: 如果centos8想加入快捷键请这样操作
